channel.title: Culture and Arts on NRRWA
channel.description: Recent content in Culture and Arts on NRRWA

item.title: Rajyothsava 2025 Celebration - Highlights
item.description: NRRWA celebrated the Rajyothsava 2025 at Namma Vana on 23 Nov. It was a grand culmination of a month long fest. Mr Dundiraj Bhat, eminent Kannada Chutuku expert, regaled the residents with his wit and humour.
